categorySelectTitle: Choose a hashtag for your images

hints.describeImages: Choose up to {{max}} that best describe this image.
hints.categorySelect: The hashtag should be a topic, hobby or interest such as #cats, #dogs, #cars or #fashion. Use a more general hashtag such as #animals if you select many kinds of animal. Clicking the box below shows a list of existing hashtags. If an existing hashtag matches what you want then use it, otherwise create a new one.
